verses.verse: Now the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H573>Amittai<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%>, that <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H7121>cry<s%> against <S%H7451>it<s%>; for their wickedness is come <S%H5927>up<s%> before <S%H6440>me<s%>.

But <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H1272>flee<s%> unto <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3305>Joppa<s%>; and he <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H591>boat<s%> <S%H935>going<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%>: so he <S%H5414>paid<s%> the <S%H7939>fare<s%> <S%H3381>there<s%>, and went down into <S%H935>it<s%>, to go with them unto <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> sent <S%H2904>out<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and there was a <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H5591>storm<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, so that the <S%H591>boat<s%> was <S%H2803>likely<s%> to be <S%H7665>broken<s%>.

Then the <S%H4419>mariners<s%> were <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, and <S%H2199>cried<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H430>god<s%>, and cast <S%H2904>forth<s%> the <S%H3627>wares<s%> that were in the <S%H591>boat<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, to <S%H7043>lighten<s%> it of <S%H3124>them<s%>. But Jonah was gone <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H5600>boat<s%>; and he <S%H7901>lay<s%>, and was fast <S%H7290>asleep<s%>.

So the <S%H7227>shipmaster<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> to <S%H559>him<s%>, and said unto <S%H7290>him<s%>, What mean you, O sleeper? <S%H6965>arise<s%>, <S%H7121>call<s%> upon your <S%H430>God<s%>, if so be that <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6245>think<s%> upon <S%H6>us<s%>, that we perish not.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H7453>fellow<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, and let us <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%>, that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> for whose <S%H7945>cause<s%> this <S%H7451>evil<s%> is upon <S%H5307>us<s%>. So they cast <S%H1486>lots<s%>, and the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon <S%H3124>Jonah<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> they unto <S%H5046>him<s%>, Tell <S%H7451>us<s%>, we pray you, for whose cause this evil is upon <S%H4399>us<s%>; What is your occupation? and from <S%H370>where<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H776>you<s%>? what is your country? and of what people are <S%H5971>you<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5680>them<s%>, I am a Hebrew; and I <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, which has <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and the dry <S%H3004>land<s%>.

Then were the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H1419>exceedingly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6213>him<s%>, Why have you done <S%H582>this<s%>? For the men <S%H3045>knew<s%> that he <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, because he had told <S%H5046>them<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> they unto <S%H6213>him<s%>, What shall we do unto <S%H3220>you<s%>, that the sea may be <S%H8367>calm<s%> unto <S%H3220>us<s%>? for the sea <S%H1980>done<s%>, and was <S%H5590>tempestuous<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5375>them<s%>, Take me up, and cast me <S%H2904>forth<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; so shall the <S%H3220>sea<s%> be <S%H8367>calm<s%> unto <S%H3045>you<s%>: for I know that for my <S%H7945>sake<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> storm is upon <S%H5591>you<s%>.

Nevertheless the <S%H582>men<s%> rowed <S%H2864>hard<s%> to <S%H7725>bring<s%> it to the <S%H3004>land<s%>; but they <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3220>not<s%>: for the sea <S%H1980>done<s%>, and was tempestuous against <S%H5590>them<s%>.

Therefore they <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, We beg <S%H577>you<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, we beg <S%H6>you<s%>, let us not perish for this <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H5315>life<s%>, and <S%H5414>lay<s%> not upon us <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>: for <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, have <S%H6213>done<s%> as it pleased <S%H2654>you<s%>.
So they took <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah<s%>, and cast him <S%H2904>forth<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>: and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H5975>ceased<s%> from her <S%H2197>raging<s%>.

Then the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1419>exceedingly<s%>, and <S%H2076>offered<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H5087>made<s%> <S%H5088>vows<s%>.

Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H4487>prepared<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1709>fish<s%> to swallow <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah<s%>. And <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> was in the <S%H4578>belly<s%> of the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>.
